text: Egha gɨn kɨ ghua Semaian gari, a Delaian otarim, Mehetabelɨn igavatarim, a uan dɨpenim ateghan kogham. Egha a kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “Ga fo, apaniba dɨmagarimɨn izɨ nɨ mɨsueghtɨ nɨ aremegham. Kamaghɨn, ga mangɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn mangɨ modogh, tiar akaba aseka.”
